shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the camera exposure area changes.

p.codeblock: virtual void onCameraExposureAreaChanged(int x, int y, int width, int height) { (void)x; (void)y; (void)width; (void)height; }
on(evt: EngineEvents.CAMERA_EXPOSURE_AREA_CHANGED, cb: ( x: number, y: number, width: number, height: number) => void ): this;

section.p: The SDK triggers this callback when the local user changes the camera exposure position by calling the method.

p.note: This method applies to mobile platforms only.

plentry.pd: The x coordinate of the changed camera exposure area.
The y coordinate of the changed camera exposure area.
The width of the changed camera exposure area.
The height of the changed exposure area.
